text: <!channel> Attention Everyone, Have you Opted In or Opted Out of the Guideline 401k??? Tomorrow is the last day to Opt-Out. Please let me know if you have questions! Iâ€™ll be around tomorrow to answer questions also. Slack me. :lit:
Opting in. Thank you. Will arrange for existing 401k to transfer

Hi <@U027PV4AP>! I have two questions about the 401k, whenever you're around:
1.  Am I correct in understanding that employer contributions are "safe harbor" contributions and are therefore 100% vested immediately?
2.  Are all Uncorked's contributions treated as a pre-tax deferrals upon retirement (i.e., I pay taxes on them when I receive distributions), regardless of whether my personal deferrals are pre-tax or Roth?
